summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2688, for the improvement of West Snoqualmie Street, form 35th Avenue Southwest to 37th Avenue Southwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and the construction of concrete sidewalks where necessary and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31585 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
